lead_paragraph: To the residents of Raqqa, the Islamic State is a brutal occupier that has brought nothing but misery.

headline.print_headline: Living Beneath the Banner of ISIS
headline.main: Living Under the Sword of ISIS in Syria

snippet: To the residents of Raqqa, the Islamic State is a brutal occupier that has brought nothing but misery.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Marwan Hisham describes lamentable situation for Syrians living in Raqqa, Syria, de facto capital for Islamic State; says residents struggle to eke out living and are subject to bombings by Syrian government and American-led coalition, conscription into Islamic State and pressure to join insurgency; urges international community to stop government bombings and refrain from grouping citizens with extremists.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
